nodes.text: The Inquisitorium dark trooper was a dark trooper variant.
The trooper unit was used by the Inquisitorius branch of the Galactic Empire. Some were deployed on Mustafar in 1 ABY, and used tactics such as attack pattern Ignimus.

This Dark trooper design is strikingly similar to the Phase III Dark Troopers. These Dark troopers used heavy weapons, but relied on pistols and shock staffs as well, despite the trooper's clunky size.
